title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about Lilly’s obesity pill, pharma deals with Trump, and much more
description: A Lilly investigational obesity pill largely helped patients maintain their weight loss after they switched from injectable treatments Wegovy and Zepbound
content: A Lilly investigational obesity pill largely helped patients maintain their weight loss after they switched from injectable treatments Wegovy and Zepbound
